summary: The figure is also a decline of 22% compared with the $324 million WisdomTree reported for Q1 2022.
title: WisdomTree's Q2 Average Crypto Assets Down Nearly 12% on Year, to $265M
content: Asset manager WisdomTree's (WETF) managed crypto assets worth an average $265 million in Q2, a decrease of nearly 12% compared to the equivalent figure of $300 million a year ago.
